examples: I ride my bike to work every day.
He enjoys going on long bike rides.
Eu vou de bicicleta para o trabalho todos os dias.
Ele gosta de fazer longos passeios de bicicleta.

suggested: Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired from all the riding!
Sometimes, a bike can remind us of childhood memories or loved ones who are no longer with us.
Why do some drivers refuse to share the road with cyclists? It's so frustrating and dangerous!
Did you know that the longest distance ever cycled in one year was over 75,000 miles? That's equivalent to cycling around the world three times!
The scent of fresh air and freedom that surrounds you when you ride a bike outdoors.
The sensation of gripping the handlebars and feeling the vibration of the road beneath you while riding a bike.
Riding a bike can create a sense of connection with nature, the environment, and the local community as you explore your surroundings.
